Update the settings of the room.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"private_mode":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indicates if the room is in private mode."},"locked_controls":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indicates if the room controls are locked."},"implicit_hosting":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indicates if implicit hosting is enabled."},"inactive_cursors":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indicates if inactive cursors are shown."},"merciful_reconnect":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indicates if merciful reconnect is enabled."},"plugins":{"type":"object","additionalProperties":true,"description":"Additional plugin settings."}},"title":"Settings"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
